Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Shall be in order to consider as an original bill, the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Education and the workforce now printed in the bill. Measure will be considered read. No amendment shall be in order except those printed in the Congressional Record for that purpose.
